channel.title: Data science on Anders Ellern Bilgrau
channel.description: Recent content in Data science on Anders Ellern Bilgrau

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Cases Section of Orthodontics, University of Aarhus Statistical analysis of material from Peter Bangsgaard Stoustrup, Section of Orthodontics, University of Aarhus. We estimated the incidence of orofacial complications as well as identified predictors of dentofacial growth abnormalities in patients with Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (JIA) also known as rheumatoid arthritis. Hematology Department, Aalborg University Co-developer of hemaClass.org , a web application that classifies genetic samples of patients with diffuse large-cell B-cell lymphoma and myeloma into prognostic groups for survival.

item.title: About me
item.description: Backgrund I am a statistician with a flair for programming and a self-driven creative urge. I am a Ph.D. in (bio)statistics and a master in applied mathematics specializing in statistics. Both degrees were obtained through an interdisciplinary collaboration with the Department of Mathematical Sciences, Aalborg University, and the Hematological Department, Aalborg University Hospital. Visualisering af et gen-netv√¶rk In short, my PhD project consisted of a number of methods in high-dimensional statistics on reproducibility and data integration with applications in molecular cancer biology.
